Special Strays (Foes)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Battle (Tournaments/Strays): Special Strays (Foes)
Under Construction
These monsters can appear and attack you on your ranch. The raise column lists any known requirements for the monster you need to be raising to get the attack. As fas as we know, the attack can occur in the listed rank, or above. See other threads for ways to provoke an attack by one of these strays.
Note: Just so it's been said, you need to have the breed unlocked before these attacks will occur. More than likely, in the case of Legends (Ifrit) you need to open the Legends first.

NameUnlocksPowIntAccSpdDefLifRankRaise
BredTorridon281274243177291335AAnything
BurnsIfrit422422434421465389AWhitehound
CazeLiarosa370370330319308384AGaru
KurosawaZan446323524431382454AAnything
PhillBlaze495517463462405526APhoenix
RagnarokDragon756765711688723911AAngel
